title: Ron Paul on The Daily Show
author: VD
content_html: “A good message, the philosophy of Liberty. People are still interested in being free people, living in a free country…. it’s a good message, but I don’t believe in spreading it with guns.”
content_text:
“
A good message
, the philosophy of Liberty.  People are still interested in being free people, living in a free country…. it’s a good message, but I don’t believe in spreading it with guns.”
